title: Sri Lanka plans to talk with IMF on April 18, says Finance Minister - ANI News
content: Sri Lanka plans to talk with IMF on April 18, says Finance Minister  ANI News
description: Colombo [Sri Lanka], April 14 (ANI): Sri Lanka is planning to start the talk with the International Monetary Fund (IMF) on April 18 to secure at least USD 4 billion in aid for the economy, said Sri Lanka Finance Minister, local media reported.
